abstract: Ruminations on wandering serfs and derelicts, the harvesting of signs by the Smithsonian, and the passage of a resolution to limit the duration of drumming.
snippet: Ruminations on wandering serfs and derelicts, the harvesting of signs by the Smithsonian, and the passage of a resolution to limit the duration of drumming.
lead_paragraph: Are the Occupy Wall Street protesters the modern-day equivalent of wandering serfs in 14th-century Britain? Or are they a bunch of grubby lowlifes and ex-cons? [Metro Focus, New York Post]
